sentences.sContent: Leonard was nine when his father died.
sentences.sCn: 父亲去世时伦纳德九岁。

sentences.sContent: When the family came here from Russia, they were penniless.
sentences.sCn: 那家人从俄罗斯迁来这里的时候身无分文。

sentences.sContent: When he was in the air force he flew Tornado jets.
sentences.sCn: 他在空军服役时驾驶旋风式战斗机。

trans.tranOther: at or during the time that something happens
